data.eml:eml: Description of a new neotropical species of Xiqilliba Kramer (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Neocoelidiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ale-Rocha, Rosaly (2017): Description of a new neotropical species of Xiqilliba Kramer (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Neocoelidiinae). Zootaxa 4311 (3): 409-416, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4311.3.6
